meanings.definition: A person who gives tips or advice, especially in gambling or sports betting.
meanings.sent1: The tipsters at the racetrack shared their predictions for the upcoming horse races.
meanings.sent2: I always follow the advice of tipsters before placing my bets on football games.
meanings.sent3: The tipsters joked that they could predict the weather better than the meteorologists.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the tipster of the group, always offering the best advice on which stocks to invest in.
meanings.sent5: The tipsters' insights were like gold, helping me make smart decisions in the casino.

meanings.sent1: The tipsters gathered at the convention to discuss their strategies for sharing tips.
meanings.sent2: We received tips from multiple tipsters on how to improve our cooking skills.
meanings.sent3: The tipsters formed a club to exchange their best advice on gardening.
meanings.sent4: In the world of online forums, tipsters were like stars, guiding others with their knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The group of tipsters was a valuable resource for those seeking guidance in various areas.
